name: Camp Chaos
description:
The campers are coming. The tents are not setup yet! It is your job to make sure the campsite is ready for the campers to arrive. Do you have what it takes to prepare a whole campsite in a limited amount of time?

Controls:

  • Movement (WASD), Mouse look
  • F to pick up
    • F to drop if holding something
  • E to interact
  • Minigames:
    • Tarp Placement: Mouse Look and Left Click (scroll wheel to rotate)
    • Tent Placement: Mouse Look and Left Click (scroll wheel to rotate) Align with arrow on tarp
    • Pole Creation: Press "Space" whenever the poles align
    • Pole Installation: Try to keep mouse cursor in circle
    • Stakes: Press prompted key rapidly

Tips:

  • How minigames affect score
    • Tarp Placement: How level the tarp is.
    • Tent Placement: How close tent is to tarp and the angle (door should be on the same side as the arrow on the tarp)
    • Pole Creation: How fast you can build the pole
    • Pole Installation: How fast you install the pole
    • Stake: How quick you can push the prompted key
  • More Tents = More Scores
  • The checklist does not update! Think of it as a Guide!
  • Use tarp and tent from same bag together
  • Percentages at the end are averages of all the scores for each tent
  • Each minigame is worth a maximum of 2000 points making a max tent score of 10,000 points

This game was created as part of the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2
